Plot: In a village in the Southwest of France, 1962. Maite and Francois are 18 years old. They are friends, not lovers. In Francois's classroom, there are Serge, whose brother has just married to...
Title: Wild Reeds
Writer: Olivier Massart, Gilles Taurand, André Téchiné
Actors: Élodie Bouchez, Gaël Morel, Stéphane Rideau, Frédéric Gorny
